mapper.select: SELECT v.aid, v.title, v.pub_time, v.copyright, v.uid, v.play, u.id, c.type FROM mug_video v LEFT JOIN mug_video_content c ON v.aid = c.aid LEFT JOIN mug_uploader u ON v.uid = u.uid WHERE ( c.type = 'G' and c.content_id = #{gameId} ) or ( c.type = 'S' and c.content_id in ( select s.song_id from mug_song s where s.game_id = #{gameId} ) ) or ( c.type = 'C' and c.content_id in ( select c.chart_id from mug_chart c left join mug_song s on s.song_id = c.song_id left join mug_game g on s.game_id = g.game_id where g.game_id = #{gameId} ) ) ORDER BY play DESC
select * from v_video v where v.type = 'S' and v.content_id = #{songId}

SELECT r.* FROM ( SELECT z.uid, u.id, round( sum( z.play * z.proportion ), 1 ) play, count( 1 ) count FROM ( SELECT v.uid, v.pub_time, v.play, ifnull( f.proportion, 1 ) proportion FROM mug_video v LEFT JOIN mug_play_config f ON datediff( str_to_date(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d'), date( v.pub_time ) ) = f.date_diff WHERE date( v.pub_time ) >= str_to_date(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') AND date( v.pub_time ) <= str_to_date(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND v.copyright = '1' ) z LEFT JOIN mug_uploader u ON z.uid = u.uid GROUP BY z.uid ) r ORDER BY r.play DESC LIMIT 30

select u.uid, u.id, z.play_avg , z.count from ( select v.uid, avg( v.play ) play_avg, sum( 1 ) count from mug_video v where v.dssq is null and v.copyright = '1' and v.pub_time < #{date} group by v.uid having sum( 1 ) >= 15 ) z left join mug_uploader u on z.uid = u.uid order by z.play_avg desc limit 30

SELECT * FROM mug_video v WHERE v.aid NOT IN ( SELECT c.aid FROM mug_video_content c ) and v.play >= #{minPlay} AND date( v.pub_time ) >= str_to_date(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and str_to_date(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date( v.pub_time )

SELECT * FROM mug_video v WHERE v.aid NOT IN ( SELECT d.aid FROM mug_dssq d ) AND v.aid IN ( SELECT c.aid FROM mug_video_content c ) AND date( v.pub_time ) >= str_to_date(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and str_to_date(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date( v.pub_time )
and date( v.update_time ) >= str_to_date(#{updateDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND v.play >= #{minPlay}
